example.text: His border policy is the reason why the border patrol officers are overwhelmed and a record number of migrants are trickling into our country illegally. We must stop this rampage at our southern border now!

Thankfully, we had some major wins this year. From simple bills that will help streamline services and cut through red tape, to major legislation that will finally force the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to recognize the health consequences of burn pits and other airborne toxins, Congress was able to put aside partisan politics and come together for those who've served.

For more photos and videos, please join me on social media: It is an honor to represent you in Congress. Sincerely, Brian Mast United States Congressman PS We also passed my legislation that will finally force the US Army Corps of Engineers to come up with a plan to end ALL discharges to the Northern Estuaries.

However, when President Biden was asked why he would visit Arizona - a border state - and not visit the border to see the crisis himself, he said "there are more important things going on." President Biden is utterly incapable of recognizing problems and addressing them.

His border policy is the reason why the border patrol officers are overwhelmed and a record number of migrants are trickling into our country illegally. We must stop this rampage at our southern border now!

In fact, they were in such a rush, they tried to argue that there wasn't time for Congress to do its job. First up, in the House Foreign Affairs Committee, Democrats suggested that we didn't have time to conduct oversight of aid being sent to Ukraine.

For more photos and videos, please join me on social media: It is an honor to represent you in Congress. Sincerely, Brian Mast United States Congressman PS We also passed my legislation that will finally force the US Army Corps of Engineers to come up with a plan to end ALL discharges to the Northern Estuaries.
